trans-unit.source: Represents a row within a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma linha dentro de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The FormViewRow class is used to represent an individual row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: A classe FormViewRow é usada para representar uma linha individual em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: Each row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control has a designated row type.
trans-unit.target: Cada linha de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>controle tem um tipo de linha designado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different row types.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir lista os tipos de linha diferente.

trans-unit.source: |Row type|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |`DataControlRowType.DataRow`|The data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.| |`DataControlRowType.EmptyDataRow`|The empty data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: | Tipo de linha | Descrição | |--------------|-----------------| | `DataControlRowType.DataRow`| A linha de dados no controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>. | | `DataControlRowType.EmptyDataRow`| Linha de dados vazios no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The empty data row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control when there are no records to display.| |`DataControlRowType.Footer`|The footer row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.| |`DataControlRowType.Header`|The header row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.| |`DataControlRowType.Pager`|A pager row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.| To determine the row type of a FormViewRow object, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.RowType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A linha de dados vazio é exibida em um controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>quando não houver registros a exibir. | | `DataControlRowType.Footer`| A linha de rodapé no controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>. | | `DataControlRowType.Header`| A linha de cabeçalho no controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>. | | `DataControlRowType.Pager`| Uma linha de pager no controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>. | Para determinar o tipo de linha de um objeto FormViewRow, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.RowType%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.RowType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: A FormViewRow object also has a state associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto FormViewRow também tem um estado associado a ele.

trans-unit.source: The state can be a bitwise combination of the values in the following table.
trans-unit.target: O estado pode ser uma combinação bit a bit dos valores na tabela a seguir.

trans-unit.source: |State value|Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |`DataControlRowState.Edit`|The FormViewRow object is in edit mode.| |`DataControlRowState.Insert`|The FormViewRow object is in insert mode.| |`DataControlRowState.Normal`|The FormViewRow object is in its normal (default) state.| |`DataControlRowState.Selected`|The FormViewRow object is selected.| To determine the state of a FormViewRow object, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.RowState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: | Valor de estado | Descrição | |-----------------|-----------------| | `DataControlRowState.Edit`| O objeto FormViewRow está no modo de edição. | | `DataControlRowState.Insert`| O objeto FormViewRow está no modo de inserção. | | `DataControlRowState.Normal`| O objeto FormViewRow está no estado normal (padrão). | | `DataControlRowState.Selected`| O objeto FormViewRow está selecionado. | Para determinar o estado de um objeto FormViewRow, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.RowState%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.RowState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control displays the contents of its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemTemplate%2A> property in a data row.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>controle exibe o conteúdo de seu <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemTemplate%2A>propriedade em uma linha de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: To access the data row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.Row%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para acessar a linha de dados, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.Row%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.Row%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of the current data item in the data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.ItemIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o índice do item de dados na fonte de dados, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.ItemIndex%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.ItemIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can access the individual cells of the FormViewRow object by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Você pode acessar as células individuais do objeto FormViewRow usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a cell contains controls, you can retrieve a control from the cell by using one of the following methods: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection of the cell to retrieve the control at a specific index.
trans-unit.target: Se uma célula contiver controles, você pode recuperar um controle da célula, usando um dos métodos a seguir:-Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>coleção da célula para recuperar o controle em um índice específico.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method of the cell to retrieve the control, if the control has its <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property set.
trans-unit.target: -Usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>método da célula para recuperar o controle, se o controle tiver seu <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>conjunto de propriedades.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred method to retrieve a control from a cell.
trans-unit.target: Esse é o método preferencial para recuperar um controle de uma célula.

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the FormViewRow class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância da classe FormViewRow, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> class.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para inicializar uma nova instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> class.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra os valores de propriedade inicial de uma instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.ItemIndex%2A>|The value specified by the `itemIndex` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.RowType%2A>|The value specified by the `rowType` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.RowState%2A>|The value specified by the `rowState` parameter.|
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor inicial | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.ItemIndex%2A>| O valor especificado pelo `itemIndex` parâmetro. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.RowType%2A>| O valor especificado pelo `rowType` parâmetro. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.RowState%2A>| O valor especificado pelo `rowState` parâmetro. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.RowState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.RowType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.ItemIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the data item in the data source.
trans-unit.target: O índice do item de dados na fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"> </xref> valores de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"> </xref> valores de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the data item displayed from the data source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice do item de dados exibido da fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: Use the ItemIndex property to determine the index of the data item.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade ItemIndex para determinar o índice do item de dados.

trans-unit.source: The index of the data item displayed from the data source.
trans-unit.target: O índice do item de dados exibido da fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether to pass an event up the page's ASP.NET server control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Determina se deve transmitir um evento a hierarquia de controle de servidor ASP.NET da página.

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: A origem do evento.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event has been canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o evento foi cancelado; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Renders the control to the specified HTML writer.
trans-unit.target: Renderiza o controle para o gravador HTML especificado.

trans-unit.source: The HTML text writer object that receives the control content.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de gravador de texto HTML que recebe o conteúdo do controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use the RowState property to determine the state of the row.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade RowState para determinar o estado da linha.

trans-unit.source: The state can be a bitwise combination of the values in the following table.
trans-unit.target: O estado pode ser uma combinação bit a bit dos valores na tabela a seguir.

trans-unit.source: |State value|Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |`DataControlRowState.Edit`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object is in edit mode.| |`DataControlRowState.Insert`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object is in insert mode.| |`DataControlRowState.Normal`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object is in its normal, read-only state.| |`DataControlRowState.Selected`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object is selected.| This property is commonly used to determine the state of a row before performing an operation.
trans-unit.target: | Valor de estado | Descrição | |-----------------|-----------------| | `DataControlRowState.Edit`| O objeto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>está no modo de edição. | | `DataControlRowState.Insert`| O objeto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>está no modo de inserção. | | `DataControlRowState.Normal`| O objeto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>está no estado normal, somente leitura. | | `DataControlRowState.Selected`| O objeto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>está selecionado. | Essa propriedade normalmente é usada para determinar o estado de uma linha antes de executar uma operação.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"> </xref> valores de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Gets the row type of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de linha do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use the RowType property to determine the type of row that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object represents.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade RowType para determinar o tipo de linha que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>objeto representa.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different row type values.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir lista os valores de tipo de linha diferente.

trans-unit.source: |Row type|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |`DataControlRowType.DataRow`|The data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.| |`DataControlRowType.EmptyDataRow`|The empty data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: | Tipo de linha | Descrição | |--------------|-----------------| | `DataControlRowType.DataRow`| A linha de dados no controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>. | | `DataControlRowType.EmptyDataRow`| Linha de dados vazios no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The empty data row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control when there are no records to display.| |`DataControlRowType.Footer`|The footer row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.| |`DataControlRowType.Header`|The header row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.| |`DataControlRowType.Pager`|A pager row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.| |`DataControlRowType.Separator`|A separator row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.| This property is commonly used to determine a row's type before performing an operation.
trans-unit.target: A linha de dados vazio é exibida em um controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>quando não houver registros a exibir. | | `DataControlRowType.Footer`| A linha de rodapé no controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>. | | `DataControlRowType.Header`| A linha de cabeçalho no controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>. | | `DataControlRowType.Pager`| Uma linha de pager no controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>. | | `DataControlRowType.Separator`| Uma linha separadora no controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>. | Essa propriedade normalmente é usada para determinar o tipo da linha antes de executar uma operação.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"> </xref> valores.
